underlying_goal: Create and integrate teammate-spawn skills for Claude agent teams to enforce quality control on tool prompts, specifically ensuring skill loading instructions are explicit in spawned teammate prompts
friction_detail: Claude created unnecessary YAML validation files, entered plan mode when user didn't want it, and the general teammate-spawn skill had routing language that caused refusals in practice.
brief_summary: User wanted teammate-spawn skills created to enforce quality control on agent team prompts; the impl-specific and general versions were built and debugged, but the session was interrupted before completing the spec-builder version.
